projects.title: Tableau Stories and Dashboards
projects.description: Worked on a sample dataset of Super store, generally available and create story using various charts explaining the data

projects.title: Portfolio Diversification using Correlation
projects.description: - Created correlation matrix to evaluate the assets in a portfolio- Analysed the diversified portfolio for correlated assets

projects.title: Portfolio Optimization using Markowitz Model
projects.description: - Compared the Stock and Bond returns individually using Mean - Variance - Standard Deviation - Sharpe ratio- Optimized the portfolio using the Markowitz model- Created a high Sharpe ratio portfolio for 2 Assets using Markowitz model

projects.title: Risk and Return: Sharpe ratio in python
projects.description: Performed Investment analysis with Sharpe ratio on Amazon and Facebook's stock data with the index of S&P 500 set as benchmark for this analysis during the period of 2016-17.

projects.title: 366 Days of Learning
projects.description: This year was a leap year with a day extra. So, I started a self-improvising project inspired from an exercise of Photography.Project focused on:# Continuous and Active learning# Allowed me to improve observation skill# Allowed me to learn more from seeing# Helped in Self-Development# Helped me in improving my time management skills# Helped me to create much more value out of 24 hrs# Overall it let me grow from all areas to achieve my goal

projects.title: A study on Educational Loans in India
projects.description: I compared the educational loans provided in India under various categories.Comparisons were made in:- Top 10 Public Banks- Top 10 Private Banks- Top 10 NBFCs- Compared the average interest rate of educational loans,among >Developed countries >Asian countries & >Neighbouring countries

projects.title: Acquisition: A boon or bane with reference to Walmart Inc, a financial approach.
projects.description: Walmart Inc. holds quite many retail co. in many countries to spread their business and in 2019 it made the biggest acquisition for its business, bought Flipkart to fulfill its dream of gaining its long-awaited dream of business expansion in the Indian market.To achieve my objective to check whether Mergers and Acquisitions are boon or bane,I compared the financial statements of the company (Walmart Inc.) before and after the acquisition of Flipkart.I compared different year's financials with various different analysis techniques:- Comparative Analysis- Common Size Analysis- Ratio AnalysisWould love to discuss more, if you are eager about the result and certain other details.
